title: यूपी पुलिस की प्राथमिक जाँच के अनुसार इस प्रकरण का किसी भी साम्प्रदायिक मुद्दे से जुड़ाव नहीं है।
author: www.factcrescendo.com
vclaim: Chandauli: Family of a 17-yr-old boy, Khalid, alleged he was set ablaze by some people when he refused to chant ‘Jai Sri Ram’.SP Chandauli says that boy has given different statements which were found to be false in investigation, eye witness saw him setting himself ablaze.(28.7) pic.twitter.com/KpfaepUGBj
